query:
UPDATE Tasks
        SET
            name = ?,
            priority = ?,
            description = ?,
            completed = ?,
            due = ?,
            group_id = ?
        WHERE pub_id = ?
        RETURNING 
            pub_id as task_pub_id,
            name as task_name,
            group_id,
            (SELECT g.name FROM Groups g WHERE g.pub_id = Tasks.group_id) as group_name,
            priority as "priority: Priority",
            description,
            completed,
            due
